episodes.title: 19. We Infiltrated a Cult
episodes.description:
In the first of a two part series on cults, Cameron walks us through one of the most infamous alleged cults, the Church of Scientology, to figure out if it is a cult or not. After the episode, Cameron even goes into the Church...

- New Episodes Every Wednesday-
